src:
They said what?! Pros react to Jorge Masvidal’s cuts stoppage win over Nate Diaz at UFC 244
03 Nov 2019, 05:06 by Lucas Rezende



UFC 244 came to an end in frustrating fashion. After three exciting rounds, the fight was waved off via medical stoppage due to Nate Diaz’s eyebrow cut, declaring Jorge Masvidal the winner via TKO in the night’s main event. On Twitter, pro fighters reacted to the outcome.
IT’S NOT TOO LATE TO Watch ‘UFC ON ESPN + 20 - ‘MAIA VS ASKREN’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action!
